en.answer: When performing a Ritual Summon using Forbidden Arts of the Gishki, you can apply the effect of a Djinn Releaser of Rituals in your Graveyard. However, you cannot apply the effect of a Djinn Releaser of Rituals in your opponent's Graveyard.
en.question: When I perform a Ritual Summon using Forbidden Arts of the Gishki, can I apply the effect of a Djinn Releaser of Rituals in my Graveyard, or in my opponent's Graveyard?
en.title: When Tributing monsters with the effect of Forbidden Arts of the Gishki, can I apply an effect such as that of Djinn Releaser of Rituals?

ja.answer: 「<<9398>>」の効果によって、自分の墓地に存在する「<<8472>>」等の効果を適用する事はできますが、相手の墓地に存在する「<<8472>>」等の効果を適用する事はできません。
ja.question: 「<<9398>>」の効果で儀式召喚を行う際に、自分または相手の墓地に存在する「<<8472>>」等の効果を適用する事はできますか？
ja.title: 「<<9398>>」の効果でリリースを行う時、「<<8472>>」等の効果は適用できますか？
